title: June 12, 2077
body: I am absolutely stunned. There are no words to express how I feel. How did we get to this point? We are watching the news and Russia nuked our capital and New York! China took out California! Our government is responding in kind.....This isn't happening. Whoa!! A bomb....no wait.... two bombs just hit nearby. What should I do?! I think we are safe inside the dam.....
